ImbricationCommand¶

class baca.ImbricationCommand.ImbricationCommand(voice_name=None, segment=None, *specifiers, allow_unused_pitches=None, by_pitch_class=None, extend_beam=None, hocket=None, selector=None, truncate_ties=None)¶

Imbrication command.

>>> from abjad import rhythmmakertools as rhythmos

Defaults:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Multiple imbricated voices:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9],
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         baca.staccato(baca.pheads()),
...         ),
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 3',
...         [16, 10, 18],
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         baca.accent(baca.pheads()),
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Hides tuplet brackets above imbricated voice:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         beam_rests=True,
...         ),
...     baca.staccato(baca.pheads()),
...     baca.PitchFirstRhythmCommand(
...         rhythm_maker=baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...             talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...                 counts=[1],
...                 denominator=16,
...                 ),
...             time_treatments=[1],
...             ),
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         baca.accent(baca.pheads()),
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Special methods

__call__(container=None)¶

Calls command on container.

Works with pitch-classes:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     baca.PitchFirstRhythmCommand(
...         rhythm_maker=baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...             talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...                 counts=[3],
...                 denominator=16,
...                 ),
...             ),
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> segment = [
...     abjad.NumberedPitchClass(10),
...     abjad.NumberedPitchClass(6),
...     abjad.NumberedPitchClass(4),
...     abjad.NumberedPitchClass(3),
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         segment,
...         baca.accent(baca.pheads()),
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Skips wrapped pitches:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker()

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16], [15, 20, 19, 9],
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16], [15, 20, 19, 9],
...     ]
>>> segment = [
...     0,
...     baca.coat(10),
...     baca.coat(18),
...     10, 18,
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         segment,
...         baca.accent(baca.pheads()),
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Segment-maker allows for beam extension.

Extends beam across figures:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> voice_1_selections = []
>>> voice_2_selections = []
>>> time_signatures = []
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     [[0, 2, 10, 18], [16, 15, 23]],
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 10],
...         baca.staccato(baca.pheads()),
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         extend_beam=True,
...         ),
...     )
>>> dictionary = contribution.selections
>>> voice_1_selections.append(dictionary['Voice 1'])
>>> voice_2_selections.append(dictionary['Voice 2'])
>>> time_signatures.append(contribution.time_signature)
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     [[19, 13, 9, 8]],
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [13, 9],
...         baca.staccato(baca.pheads()),
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         ),
...     )
>>> dictionary = contribution.selections
>>> voice_1_selections.append(dictionary['Voice 1'])
>>> voice_2_selections.append(dictionary['Voice 2'])
>>> time_signatures.append(contribution.time_signature)

>>> maker = baca.SegmentMaker(
...     ignore_repeat_pitch_classes=True,
...     measures_per_stage=[1, 1],
...     score_template=baca.TwoVoiceStaffScoreTemplate(),
...     spacing=baca.HorizontalSpacingSpecifier(
...         minimum_duration=abjad.Duration(1, 24),
...         ),
...     time_signatures=time_signatures,
...     )
>>> maker(
...     ('MusicVoiceTwo', 1),
...     baca.RhythmCommand(
...         rhythm_maker=voice_2_selections[0],
...         ),
...     )
>>> maker(
...     ('MusicVoiceTwo', 2),
...     baca.RhythmCommand(
...         rhythm_maker=voice_2_selections[1],
...         ),
...     )
>>> maker(
...     ('MusicVoiceOne', 1),
...     baca.RhythmCommand(
...         rhythm_maker=voice_1_selections[0],
...         ),
...     )
>>> maker(
...     ('MusicVoiceOne', 2),
...     baca.RhythmCommand(
...         rhythm_maker=voice_1_selections[1],
...         ),
...     )

>>> lilypond_file = maker.run(environment='docs')

Works with chords:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     {0, 2, 10, 18, 16},
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Works with rests:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         ),
...     baca.rests_around([2], [2]),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Returns new container.

(AbjadObject).__format__(format_specification='')¶

Formats Abjad object.

Set format_specification to ‘’ or ‘storage’. Interprets ‘’ equal to ‘storage’.

Returns string.

(AbjadObject).__repr__()¶

Gets interpreter representation of Abjad object.

Returns string.

Return type:Optional[OrderedDict]

Gets score template.

Return type:ScoreTemplate

Is true when command tags measure number.

Return type:Optional[bool]

Read-only properties

allow_unused_pitches¶

Is true when specifier allows unused pitches.

Allows unused pitches:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         beam_rests=True,
...         ),
...     baca.staccato(baca.pheads()),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         baca.accent(baca.pheads()),
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         allow_unused_pitches=True,
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Raises exception on unused pitches:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         beam_rests=True,
...         ),
...     baca.staccato(baca.pheads()),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     ]
>>> result = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         baca.accent(baca.pheads()),
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         ),
...     )
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "<stdin>", line 8, in <module>
  File "/Users/trevorbaca/baca/baca/MusicMaker.py", line 648, in __call__
    specifiers,
  File "/Users/trevorbaca/baca/baca/MusicMaker.py", line 780, in _call_imbrication_commands
    imbricated_selection = specifier(container)
  File "/Users/trevorbaca/baca/baca/ImbricationCommand.py", line 1410, in __call__
    raise Exception(message)
Exception: Cursor(source=Sequence(items=(2, 19, 9, 18, 16)), position=4, singletons=True, suppress_exception=True) used only 3 of 5 pitches.

Defaults to none:

>>> specifier = baca.ImbricationCommand()
>>> specifier.allow_unused_pitches is None
True

Set to true, false or none.

Returns true, false or none.

by_pitch_class¶

Is true when specifier matches on pitch-class rather than pitch.

Set to true, false or none.

Defaults to none.

Returns true, false or none.

(Command).deactivate¶

Is true when command deactivates tag.

Return type:Optional[bool]
extend_beam¶

Is true when specifier extends beam.

Set to true, false or none.

Returns true, false or none.

hocket¶

Is true when specifier hockets voices.

Hockets voices:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         beam_rests=True,
...         ),
...     baca.staccato(baca.pheads()),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         baca.accent(baca.pheads()),
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         hocket=True,
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> specifier = baca.ImbricationCommand()
>>> specifier.hocket is None
True

Set to true, false or none.

Returns true, false or none.

segment¶

Gets to-be-imbricated segment.

Returns pitch or pitch-class segment.

selector¶

Gets selector.

Selects last nine notes:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         beam_rests=True,
...         ),
...     baca.staccato(baca.pheads()),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16], [15, 20, 19, 9],
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16], [15, 20, 19, 9],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 18, 16, 15],
...         baca.accent(baca.pheads()),
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         selector=baca.plts()[-9:],
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> specifier = baca.ImbricationCommand()
>>> specifier.selector is None
True

Set to selector or none.

Returns selector or none.

specifiers¶

Gets specifiers.

Beams nothing:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...             beam_each_division=False,
...             ),
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Beams divisions together but excludes skips:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...             beam_divisions_together=True,
...             ),
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Beams divisions together and includes skips:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Beams each division and includes skips:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...         beam_divisions_together=True,
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [
...     [0, 2, 10, 18, 16],
...     [15, 20, 19, 9, 0],
...     [2, 10, 18, 16, 15],
...     ]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 19, 9, 18, 16],
...         rhythmos.BeamSpecifier(
...             beam_rests=True,
...             ),
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Returns specifiers or none.

(Command).tag¶

Gets tag.

Return type:Tag
(Command).tags¶

Gets tags.

Return type:List[Tag]
truncate_ties¶

Is true when specifier truncates ties.

Truncates ties:

>>> music_maker = baca.MusicMaker(
...     baca.PitchFirstRhythmCommand(
...         rhythm_maker=baca.PitchFirstRhythmMaker(
...             talea=rhythmos.Talea(
...                 counts=[5],
...                 denominator=32,
...                 ),
...             ),
...         ),
...     )

>>> collections = [[0, 2, 10], [18, 16, 15, 20, 19], [9]]
>>> contribution = music_maker(
...     'Voice 2',
...     collections,
...     baca.ImbricationCommand(
...         'Voice 1',
...         [2, 10, 18, 19, 9],
...         baca.beam_everything(),
...         truncate_ties=True,
...         ),
...     )
>>> lilypond_file = music_maker.show(contribution)
>>> abjad.show(lilypond_file, strict=89)

Defaults to none:

>>> specifier = baca.ImbricationCommand()
>>> specifier.truncate_ties is None
True

Set to true, false or none.

Returns true, false or none.

voice_name¶

Gets voice name.

Returns string.
